name: Dale DeGroff’s Mojito
preparation:
Cocktail pioneer and author of “The Craft of the Cocktail,” Dale DeGroff makes his Mojitos the right way—with fresh ingredients and good rum.

In a shaker, lightly muddle the mint.

Add the rum, simple syrup and lime juice, fill with ice and strain.

Pour into a highball glass.

Top with the club soda.

Garnish with a mint sprig.
